

    Author: aria

Video ini berisi banyak QR code.

## Solution

```sh
 $ md frames; ffmpeg -i ./video.mp4 frames/frame-%3d.jpg; cd frames

 $ zbarimg frame-001.jpg
scanned 1 barcode symbols from 1 images in 0.06 seconds

QR-Code:IDX:000/67|

  $ for F in frame-001.jpg; do zbarimg "$F" 2>/dev/null| rg -e 'QR-Code:IDX:\d\d\d/67\|(.+)' -r '$1';done


  $ for F in frame-001.jpg; do zbarimg "$F" 2>/dev/null| rg -e 'QR-Code:IDX:\d\d\d/67\|(.+)' -r '$1' | base64 -d | xxd -p ;done
ffd8ffe000104a46494600010102002500250000ffdb0043000302020202
02030202020303030304060404040404080606050609080a0a090809090a
0c0f0c0a0b0e0b09090d110d0e0f101011100a0c12131210130f101010ff
db00430103030304030408040408100b090b101010101010101010101010
101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010
1010101010101010ffc000110800c5015e03011100021101031101ffc400
1d000002030101010101000000000000000005060304070802010900ffc4
004410000201030303020404040404030803010102030405110006210712
3113411422516108327181152342911652a1c1243362b143d1f009172553
7282a2e11826b2f1ffc4001c010002030101010100000000000000000003
0401020506000708ffc40039110002020202020005030203070305000001
02000304111221053106132241511432612342157181073352627291b116

ecc48f230060e3dcfdb4e226e018c60a7a87b4d35cad72d0d0d51ab0b4cf
51222cc69cac8af9a7901c2b1c769c672a4e31a76b53167064b4b130456f
4ce319ce9e44d45cf5182d90331190064796191cf1ab8ee0ae6ea697b2ac
dea54050a5b247274f78fa3e7d81673d9b78a833b7da776fe103a64976dc
3fe26ad8334b6a00c791c194f8c7fdf42f8b3c87e8e8fd2a1f7388f84bc7

  $ rm flag.jpg; for F in frame-0*; do zbarimg "$F" 2>/dev/null| rg -e 'QR-Code:IDX:\d\d\d/67\|(.+)' -r '$1' | base64 -d >>flag.jpg;done
rm: flag.jpg: No such file or directory

  $ open flag.jpg

  $ echo 'RkdURXtyZWNvbnN0cnVjdF9xcI92aWRIb30=' | base64 -d
FGTE{reconstruct_qp�vidHo}%
  $ echo 'RkdURXtyZWNvbnN0cnVjdF9xcI92aWRlb30=' | base64 -d
FGTE{reconstruct_qp�video}%
  $ echo 'RkdURXtyZWNvbnN0cnVjdF9xcl92aWRlb30=' | base64 -d
FGTE{reconstruct_qr_video}%
  $ echo 'RkdURXtyZWNvbnN0cnVjdF9xcl92aWRlb30=' | base64 -d
```
